title: Authorizes alco-sensor portable testing of motor vehicle operators by Triborough bridge and tunnel authority officers
summary: Authorizes Triborough bridge and tunnel authority officers to administer alco-sensor screening tests to determine if a person has consumed alcohol when an accident has occurred on authority property; operator will be transported to intoxicated driver testing unit of NYC police department if operator of motor vehicle tests positive; establishes a training program to instruct such officers in the use of breath screening equipment.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting Triborough bridge and tunnel authority officers to administer alco-sensor tests in certain cases
